dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents roads in Cote d'Ivoire. The Global Map Cote d'Ivoire version 2 was developed based on Global Map Specifications version 2.2. The data source of Boundary, Drainage and Transportation layers were a 1:500000 map image (Topo 500 V2) made in 2012.Global Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
Centre de recherche géographique et de production cartographique (Brazzaville, Congo)
